error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function date_iso8601(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use date('c', $date) instead.
Call to deprecated function date_iso8601(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use date('c', $date) instead.

Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\moderation_scheduler\ModerationSchedulerService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated function date_iso8601(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use date('c', $date) instead.
Call to deprecated function date_iso8601(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use date('c', $date) instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to moderation_scheduler.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
